Database

Class DatabaseAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database.DatabaseAccess

  • public final class DatabaseAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to access database budget.db.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseAccess(Context context)
      Contains connection and functionality with budget.db.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the database.
      Category[] getAllCategories()
      Returns an array of all categories in the database.
      Category getCategory(int ID)
      Returns a category with given ID.
      Split[] getPendingSplits()
      Returns all splits that have pending status.
      Record getRecord(int ID)
      Returns a record object with given ID.
      Record[] getRecordByDate(int month, int year)
      Returns all records in month and year of given variables.
      User getUser(java.lang.String username)
      Checks database for given username and returns a filled User object if found.
      Category newCategory(java.lang.String name, boolean alarm, double limit, Money m)
      Saves passed input to database.

      Saves passed input to database.

      Creates a new split record in the database.

      Saves passed input to database.

      Set the SQLite database object.

      Updates the alarm and limit for given category object.

      Updates split status with status in object.

      Updates the user's password and picture from given object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseAccess

        public DatabaseAccess(Context context)
        Contains connection and functionality with budget.db. Close connection with close() when finished.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the database.

      • setDatabaseCon

        public void setDatabaseCon(SQLiteDatabase data)
        Set the SQLite database object.
        Parameters:
        data - - Sets the database object

      • newRecord

        public Record newRecord(double amount,
                        java.lang.String comment,
                        java.util.Date date,
                        Category cat)
        Saves passed input to database. On success, a new Record object will be returned or null if failed to save.
        Parameters:
        amount - - Dollar amount
        comment - - User comment
        date - - Date of record
        cat - - Category for record
        Returns:
        New Record object or null if failed

      • newCategory

        public Category newCategory(java.lang.String name,
                            boolean alarm,
                            double limit,
                            Money m)
        Saves passed input to database. On success, a new Category object will be returned or null if failed to save.
        Parameters:
        name - - Name of category
        alarm - - Alarm on/off
        m - - Money object
        Returns:
        New Category object or null if failed

      • newUser

        public User newUser(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    Bitmap image)
        Saves passed input to database. On success, a new Category object will be returned or null if failed to save. Pass null to image if no image is to be saved.
        Parameters:
        name - - Username
        password - - Hashed password
        image - - Bitmap image or null
        Returns:
        New User object or null if failed

      • getAllCategories

        public Category[] getAllCategories()
        Returns an array of all categories in the database. Array will be zero length if no categories are in the database.
        Returns:
        Array of category objects

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Checks database for given username and returns a filled User object if found. Null if not found.
        Parameters:
        username - - Username to check
        Returns:
        User object or null

      • getRecord

        public Record getRecord(int ID)
        Returns a record object with given ID. Returns null if ID is not found.
        Parameters:
        ID - - ID of record
        Returns:
        Record object or null

      • getRecordByDate

        public Record[] getRecordByDate(int month,
                                int year)
        Returns all records in month and year of given variables. Month uses 0-11 for Jan-Dec. Will return an array with no elements if no records are found.
        Parameters:
        month - - Month of records needed
        year - - Year of records needed
        Returns:
        - Array of Record objects in month, may be empty

      • getCategory

        public Category getCategory(int ID)
        Returns a category with given ID. Null if ID is not found.
        Parameters:
        ID - - ID of category
        Returns:
        - Category object or null

      • newSplit

        public Split newSplit(java.lang.String user,
                      Record record)
        Creates a new split record in the database. Record must already be in the database and not null. Status is set to Status.PENDING
        Parameters:
        user - - Name of other user in split
        record - - Record tied to split
        Returns:
        - Split object or null

      • getPendingSplits

        public Split[] getPendingSplits()
        Returns all splits that have pending status.
        Returns:
        Array of splits

      • updateSplitStatus

        public boolean updateSplitStatus(Split split)
        Updates split status with status in object.
        Parameters:
        split - - Split to update
        Returns:
        Boolean on success of update

      • updateUser

        public boolean updateUser(User user)
        Updates the user's password and picture from given object.
        Parameters:
        user - - User to update
        Returns:
        Boolean on success of update

      • updateCategory

        public boolean updateCategory(Category cat)
        Updates the alarm and limit for given category object.
        Parameters:
        cat - - Category to update
        Returns:
        Boolean on success of update
